Dead by Daylight - будь убийцей или ж жертвой.
Игра не идеальна, но если собираться с друзьями не с целью победы, а просто посмеяться и поорать, то вариант хороший. Играть в неё на полной серьезки, мне кажется, глупо, если играешь за выжившего, то легко могут попасть маньяки, которые будут преследовать только тебя и стоять у крюков, пока на нем будет болтаться твой товарищ, что вычленяет все шансы на спасения и заведомо путь к поражению, если, конечно, не попадется люк, но дожить до сей момента или ж найти его, бывает ой как не просто. Еще игру за выжившего портит, если играешь с рандомами, ведь нету возможности нормальной коммуникации. В арсенале мы имеем два жеста: "Показать пальцем" и "Призыв к себе", что хоть как-то позволяет дать намек, но не все их понимаю.  Да и за маньяка игра бывает не радужной, в лице команды выживших. которые запаслись предметами и перками, чтобы превратить твою жизнь в ад. Много недочетов, но они не критичны. Хотите провести пару десятков часов с друзьями и криками, что маньяк собака? То милости просим к костру, потерянная душа!

Amazing game overall very small issues that can be annoying to play with but are overall easy to work around. My only complaints are with some of the players play styles that seem to be encouraged by some of the perks and ability's in the game, other than that it's an amazing game.

Es un juego muy repetitivo, pero si vale la pena comprarlo, aunque los servidores a veces tardan mucho tiempo en encontrar partida ya que varia en el horario que juegues y la latencia de tu servicio de internet.
Very fun and easy for just starting players that want to get into a new game.  Although it may be rough at the start as every game is but it is well worth the practice to get very good at this game!
This is a game with a disgusting rank system.

An absolute masterpiece of a horror asymmetrical 1v4 multiplayer game. I'll start with the pros and cons first.

PROS: 
- It's intense as both killer and survivor. As a killer you get to chase survivors in challenging environments like loops around obstacles filled with pallets the survivors can stun you with all while intense chase music plays in the background. 
- As a survivor it's enjoyable both solo and with friends. During a match there is no voice / text chat. Therefore toxic players won't be able to flame you. Speaking of that, there is an end game chat but you can disable that too. 
- You can unlock non-licensed characters and perks for free. And yes there are licensed characters which you have to pay to get them and there is no way to get them for free but their perks will be free in the Shrine of Secrets. That makes this game NOT pay to win. 
- Maps are free for everyone no matter what. 
- New content and updates regularly. 
- There's a good amount of waifus on both sides. Wuv you my beloved waifu Feng Min~<3
- Devs genuinely do care about this game unlike a lot of other devs. They never gave up on this game even during the dark times.

CONS: 
- Very toxic community. As a killer you might get matched against a full team of survivors who play the game only to annoy and trigger you. I am not being biased in this argument as I have invested enough time on both sides even tho I am a killer main. 
- Devs have a history of being incompetent. Don't take this as disrespect for the devs or anyone. I know they are trying their best to make this game enjoyable for everyone. 
- The grind in this game is a real pain in the ass. The game wants you to level up every single character whether you play them or not just to get their teachable perks. And once you buy the other characters' teachable perks you need to spend even more bloodpoints on the character you are building cause you need to get their perks from the bloodweb. 
- Ranked system in this game is a joke. It doesn't determine your skill level, only how much time you invested in this game. This game isn't meant to be competitive anyway. 

Other than all that I say this game deserves a 10 / 10 MASTERPIECE. I would highly recommend this game to everyone. Let the community grow and expand.

Můžeš utéct třema způsoby. Killer tě pověsí na hák a entita tě prostě zabije. Druhý způsob je že utečeš a teabagneš killera přímo u brány nebo u hatche. Třetí způsob je že prostě dáš ALT+F4, protože máš s touhle hrou love and hate vztah. Dead by Daylight doporučuju lidem co jsou masochisti nebo podporují LGBT, protože je to v DBD až moc.

Игра клевая, но зависима от скилла и знаний. За сурва полегче, тимой в разы. Для любителей пота - игра за мана, весь 2019-2020 годы игру балансят в пользу сурвов, если вы ман новичок  вас будут драть по кд, но все окупается с приобретением скилла и здесь уже взрываются задницы токсичных сурвов. Не все сурвы токсики, но  всякой пакости хватает и там и там.

Português/Portuguese:
Dead by Daylight um dos primeiros jogos de terror multiplayer competitivo e legal de jogar com pessoas aleatórias na internet
Apresenta duas equipes os sobreviventes e o Assasino,o objetivo dos sobreviventes é ativar geradores para ativar uma porta e depois escapar e o objetivo do assasino é matar.
jogo legal e não tão repetitivo quanto parece,apresenta árvore de habilidades e muitos personagems diferentes e assasinos tambem e se preferir há muitas DLC's tanto para sobreviventes quanto para assasinos.
E isso é tudo,e bom jogos sobrevivente ou assasino!

English/Inglish:
Dead by Daylight one of the first competitive and cool multiplayer horror games to play with random people on the internet
It presents two teams the survivors and the Assassin, the objective of the survivors is to activate generators to activate a door and then escape and the assassin's objective is to kill.
cool game and not as repetitive as it seems, it has a skill tree and many different characters and killers too and if you prefer there are many DLC's for both survivors and killers.
And that's all, and good games survivor or killer!
